main: ^Thanks for coming over with me tonight. My Grandad has gone away to London  and housesitting for him is kinda boring.
^What is more fun than visiting old people's homes?
^Don't worry about it. Great chance for us to watch some Stranger Things.
WeirdOption: ^Depends who the old person is.I would love to go to David Attenborough's house. Jimmy Saville...not so much.
^Anyhow, shall we watch season 1 of Stranger Things?
^With Season 4 coming out I wouldnt mind going through all the episodes again.
^Why not. As long as you are free for 30 hours.
NiceOption: ^Exactly! I need to rewatch all of them again before season 4 comes out. Though season 2 is kinda shitty so I am fine missing some of those episodes.
^So shall we put it on now?
TV: ^Sure, I will go get it setup, go to the kitchen and get some snacks will you.
